caption:
b'We can all learn a thing or two from Arly Velasquez. Take 30 minutes out of your day with the astonishing Mexican Para skier.:flexed_biceps: #AWinningMindset

While touching on different topics in each episode, we aim to help you move forward in life and show the true power of having the right team behind you.

Check out the link in our bio to listen to the interview!
Brought to you by Allianz and the IPC.'

b'Bruno Bosnjak has no fear. A lifetime of overcoming trauma has made sure of that. A phenomenal episode of #AWinningMindset is available now to listen to. :flexed_biceps: 

By spending just 30 minutes each week listening to our podcast \xe2\x80\x9cA Winning Mindset: Lessons from the Paralympics\xe2\x80\x9d you will hear inspiring stories from Para athletes. While touching on different topics in each episode, we aim to help you move forward in life and show the true power of having the right team behind you.

Check out the link in our bio to listen to the interview!
Brought to you by Allianz and the IPC.'

b'RJ Mitte on Diversity & Inclusion. The latest, unmissable episode of A Winning Mindset is now live with the star of Breaking Bad! 

By spending just 30 minutes each week listening to our podcast \xe2\x80\x9cA Winning Mindset: Lessons from the Paralympics\xe2\x80\x9d you will hear inspiring stories from Para athletes. While touching on different topics in each episode, we aim to help you move forward in life and show the true power of having the right team behind you.

Check out the link in our bio to listen to the interview!

Brought to you by Allianz and the IPC.'

b"We must learn from every mistake we make. Manuela Scha\xcc\x88r on performance management. :dizzy:That's the latest instalment of #AWinningMindset

By spending just 30 minutes each week listening to our podcast \xe2\x80\x9cA Winning Mindset: Lessons from the Paralympics\xe2\x80\x9d you will hear inspiring stories from Para athletes. :headphone:

While touching on different topics in each episode, we aim to help you move forward in life and show the true power of having the right team behind you.
 
Check out the link in our bio to listen to the interview! :backhand_index_pointing_up::backhand_index_pointing_up:
Brought to you by Allianz and the IPC."

b'We all have things to overcome in life to get to where we want to be. But challenges provide great opportunities. :thumbs_up:

By spending just 30 minutes each week listening to our podcast \xe2\x80\x9cA Winning Mindset: Lessons from the Paralympics\xe2\x80\x9d you will hear inspiring stories from Para athletes. :headphone:
While touching on different topics in each episode, we aim to help you move forward in life and show the true power of having the right team behind you.

Brought to you by Allianz and the IPC.

#AWinningMindset #paralympics'

b'Have you heard our new podcast yet? :headphone: Together with the International Paralympic Committee we bring you fascinating stories directly into your living room.
\xe2\x80\xa2
By spending just 30 minutes each week listening to our podcast \xe2\x80\x9cA Winning Mindset: Lessons from the Paralympics\xe2\x80\x9d you will hear inspiring stories from Para athletes.
\xe2\x80\xa2
While touching on different topics in each episode, we aim to help you move forward in life and show the true power of having the right team behind you.:handshake:

Check out the link in our bio!! :smiling_face_with_smiling_eyes:

#AWinningMindset #paralympics'

b'We did it again!:party_popper: We are incredibly grateful to stay the #1 insurance brand of the world and be named the Top 40 Best Global Brands.:trophy:
This achievement is only possible with the support of our customers, partners, and employees. A big thank you for your trust and loyalty during these challenging times. :clapping_hands::clapping_hands::clapping_hands:
\xe2\x80\xa2
Looking ahead, we\xe2\x80\x99ll continue to focus on resilience, live up to our purpose, and make a difference. This is just the beginning. 
\xe2\x80\xa2
#allianz #allianzforlife #bestglobalbrands'

b'What an amazing achievement by our partners FC Bayern Munich who won three titles this season. :keycap_3::trophy::soccer_ball:

We are proud to host the Champions of Europe at the Allianz Arena:house: 

#MiaSanChampions #FCBayern #Allianz  #AllianzForLife'

b":flexed_biceps: Are you ready for the last challenge? Whether at school, home or in your community, teamwork is inevitable. :fire: For the last #AllianzFutureSessions challenge we want you to answer in the comments below what #TEAMWORK means to you AND invite your favorite teammate to join!

:goal_net: Winners will join @fcbayern ambassador @lotharmatthaus10 for an exclusive virtual session about how to be a great team player. 30 official FC Bayern M\xc3\xbcnchen jerseys will also be given away during the session!

:soccer_ball: The virtual event will happen on August 22, 2020 @4PM CEST.

:soccer_ball: You must be between 15 and 23 years old

:soccer_ball: Enter until next Wednesday, August 19, 2020

:soccer_ball: Winners will be randomly selected and contacted via DM on August 20, 2020.

:backhand_index_pointing_right: T&C: bit.ly/2CEC9CY

:backhand_index_pointing_right: Privacy Notice: bit.ly/3eDoj1W

This contest is in no way sponsored by, administered by or associated with Instagram, Inc. By entering you release Instagram of any responsibility, and you agree to Instagram's terms of use.

#AllianzForLife #lifeskills #fcbayernm\xc3\xbcnchen #FCBayern #FCB #football #bayerndemunique"

b":movie_camera: At Allianz, we believe no detail is ever too small when helping our customers. Watch how our @allianzpartners team supported one of our Canadian customers after being diagnosed with COVID-19 and Pneumonia. After making a full recovery, we learned the day he was scheduled to be discharged from the hospital was also the day of his wedding anniversary. We wanted to make sure he was home with his family on this day! We pulled all our efforts together to arrange short-notice transportation and even managed to gift his wife with a box of chocolates. It's the small details that can make a big difference.:red_heart_selector: \r\n\xe2\x80\xa2\r\nThis response is one of the many ways Allianz is supporting around the world. Over the next weeks, we'll share more #AllianzForLife updates on how our global community is #strongertogether to make a difference."

b"When the coronavirus pandemic arrived in Europe, Spain was among the worst-hit countries. But among the tragedies were acts of solidarity.
\xe2\x80\xa2
:headphone: Listen to the Monocle Magazine story on how Allianz Spain\xe2\x80\x99s @allianz_es Seguimos Continuo (\xe2\x80\x9cwe are here with you\xe2\x80\x9d) initiative pushed forward payouts for struggling small to medium-sized businesses and postponed premiums from those struggling to foot the bill. Looking to go further still, Allianz Spain contributed \xe2\x82\xac2.7m to help create the world\xe2\x80\x99s largest life-insurance product for medical staff. Remarkable times call for remarkable measures.:clapping_hands::clapping_hands::clapping_hands:
\xe2\x80\xa2
This response is one of the many ways Allianz is supporting around the world. Over the next weeks, we'll share more #AllianzForLife updates on how our global community is #strongertogether to make a difference."

b":fire: Calling young artists around the world! In this time of change, reflection, and uncertainty, how have you channeled your creativity to respond to the current moment? :artist_palette: For example: a special :bouquet: floral arrangements, sewing masks :face_with_medical_mask:, paintings, drawings, or :camera_with_flash: photographs around your city that has provided solace or inspiration?

:star-struck: You might win a chance to participate in the #AllianzFutureSessions with @themuseumofmodernart & @momaps1 and artist Laura Anderson Barbata @mx_lab and learn more about how creativity can change the world. You can also win a special Creativity Care Package filled with goodies and inspiration.
 
TO ENTER:
:white_heavy_check_mark: Post a photo or video on IG of your artwork or inspiration and include #AllianzFutureSessions
:white_heavy_check_mark: Enter until next Friday, August 07, 2020
:white_heavy_check_mark: Remember to unlock your profile so we can see your post
 
:backhand_index_pointing_right: You must be between 15 and 23 years old
:backhand_index_pointing_right: 30 winners will be randomly selected and contacted via DM on August 10, 2020.
 
T&C: bit.ly/2CEC9CY
Privacy Notice: bit.ly/3eDoj1W
 
This contest is in no way sponsored by, administered by or associated with Instagram, Inc. By entering you release Instagram of any responsibility, and you agree to Instagram's terms of use.
 
#AllianzForLife #lifeskills #creativity #mutualaid #yourvoicematters #carepackage #LauraAndersonBarbata #momateens #moma #activismart #artforsocialchange #artsaveslives"

b"There are many unseen and unintended consequences surfacing from the coronavirus pandemic, and @allianz_es is finding ways to help.
\xe2\x80\xa2
:headphone: Listen to the Monocle Magazine story on how Allianz Spain is supporting the Red Cross, vaccine research, and Fundaci\xc3\xb3n Pasqual Maragall, a Barcelona-based non-profit dedicated to scientific research around Alzheimer\xe2\x80\x99s. Other initiatives include voluntary work and home visits to the elderly undertaken by staff and the development of a special mask that offers effective protection and allows deaf people to communicate \xe2\x80\x94 something that mass-market options have overlooked. :face_with_medical_mask::thumbs_up:
\xe2\x80\xa2
This response is one of the many ways Allianz is supporting around the world. Over the next weeks, we'll share more #AllianzForLife updates on how our global community is #strongertogether to make a difference."

b"Not all superheroes wear capes! Behind the scenes, we have an incredible community of IT experts who are making it possible for over 140,000 Allianz employees to work from home. :woman_technologist::man_technologist:
\xe2\x80\xa2
We want to extend a heartfelt thank you to all the fantastic IT superheroes for a great job and helping us stay productive in these challenging times. We couldn\xe2\x80\x99t do it without you.:red_heart_selector:
\xe2\x80\xa2
This response is one of the many ways Allianz is supporting around the world. Over the next weeks, we'll share more #AllianzForLife updates on how our global community is #strongertogether to make a difference."

b"We asked explorers around the world to imagine how life could change after quarantine. How could we live, work, and move
differently? What are the moments we miss the most?
\xe2\x80\xa2
:movie_camera: Watch this emotional story from @albertogalbiati5 and the hope to restart our lives \xe2\x80\x94 changing our habits, respecting nature, and each other. We can start with the little things we love and who we love. :red_heart_selector:
\xe2\x80\xa2
This response is one of the many ways Allianz is supporting around the world. Over the next weeks, we'll share more #AllianzForLife updates on how our global community is #strongertogether to make a difference."

b'On #WorldYouthSkillsDay, our #Allianz colleagues and partners share their advice to young people on how to develop their skills and achieve their goals. Together with @FC Bayern, @Paralympics, @fiaformulae, @themuseumofmodernart and @momaps1, in these challenging times we aim to continue our support to the youth in their journey of developing life skills through the #AllianzFutureSessions. 
 
Join the conversation! :flexed_biceps: Be part of the #Commitment #challenge w/ @fiaformulae
 
#WYSD2020 #WYSD'

b"The arrival of coronavirus left many countries lacking the healthcare facilities they needed to look after
seriously ill patients.
\xe2\x80\xa2
:headphone: Listen to the Monocle Magazine story on how Allianz worked with Barcelona-based start-up Protofy to generate easy-to-manufacture ventilators. \xe2\x80\x9cI was surprised that a start-up managed to design a ventilator that it could produce in a car factory to quickly help hospitals. I talked to them and said, \xe2\x80\x98how can Allianz help?\xe2\x80\x99\xe2\x80\x9d - Monica Gonzalez Pen\xcc\x83as, market
management director of @allianz_es.
\xe2\x80\xa2
This response is one of the many ways Allianz is supporting around the world. Over the next weeks, we'll share more #AllianzForLife updates on how our global community is #strongertogether to make a difference."

b"At Allianz, we are proud to play a role in our customers, employees, and society\xe2\x80\x99s futures. We\xe2\x80\x99re also excited to work with the next generation and their ideas about the future. With the Allianz Talent Program, we can offer new graduates the opportunities to develop their professional skills, even during the crisis. The invaluable experience gained overcoming this challenging moment in time will positively shape the leaders they become.
\xe2\x80\xa2
\xe2\x80\x9cA virus that quickly brought the whole world to its knees, I feared that it might jeopardize my hiring at Allianz. Yet, I was informed by the Allianz Talent Program that I would receive a contract, along with 14 Master\xe2\x80\x99s colleagues coming from different Italian universities and with different backgrounds. I passed my trial period and am continuing my career in Allianz: organizing training sessions and working on strategic projects.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x94 from a new graduate working at Allianz. :woman_technologist:
\xe2\x80\xa2
This response is one of the many ways Allianz is supporting around the world. Over the next weeks, we'll share more #AllianzForLife updates on how our global community is #strongertogether to make a difference."

b"Creating a sense of purpose is key to keeping staff motivated! 
\xe2\x80\xa2
:headphone: Listen to the Monocle Magazine story with Serge Raffard, group strategy, marketing, distribution officer at Allianz on how we safeguard our customers\xe2\x80\x99 futures by ensuring that 150,000 global employees feel good and have the right tools to deliver on the company\xe2\x80\x99s purpose.:blue_heart: 
\xe2\x80\xa2
This response is one of the many ways Allianz is supporting around the world. Over the next weeks, we'll share more #AllianzForLife updates on how our global community is #strongertogether to make a difference."

b'Wanna burn calories for a good cause? :woman_running_selector::man_biking_selector::person_in_lotus_position:

This year, we\xe2\x80\x99re celebrating the 5th year of the #AllianzWorldRun in cooperation with @SOS Children\xe2\x80\x99s Villages! Over the next 90 days, #Allianz employees, families & friends will run and work out with a common goal of shaping a better future for everyone. 

Besides running, #AllianzWorldRun2020 participants can show their support five @SOS_Children Villages affected by #covid19 & climate change by simply doing the workout of their choice \xe2\x80\x93 be it yoga, zumba, cycling, weightlifting or HIIT!

https://www.allianzworldrun.com

#runtogether #futuregenerations'

b"Our health \xe2\x80\x94 and the health of others \xe2\x80\x94 has never been more important. We celebrated our first global Allianz Health Day to boost physical activity, inspire teamwork through sports, and foster diversity & inclusion. 
\xe2\x80\xa2 
More than 200 Allianz employees joined virtually from all over the world \xe2\x80\x94 Singapore, China, India, Egypt, Germany, the US, and Columbia. We were moving and shaking our bodies as @vabuchaiber was taking us through new Zumba dance moves. Learning to dance through uncertainty can make us more resilient, open-minded, and accept failures \xe2\x80\x94 plus it\xe2\x80\x99s fun! :beaming_face_with_smiling_eyes:
\xe2\x80\xa2
We even had German Paralympic athlete @denise_schindler share an inspiring talk about her story of resilience and courage as an athlete. The ability to keep a positive attitude and push through challenges is a lesson from sports that can be related to our daily lives. :flexed_biceps:
\xe2\x80\xa2
What is one thing you can do today to live a healthier life? 
\xe2\x80\xa2
This response is one of the many ways Allianz is supporting around the world. Over the next weeks, we'll share more #AllianzForLife updates on how our global community is #strongertogether to make a difference."

b"We love supporting and strengthening our communities. :blue_heart:  Allianz Life partners with Minnesota United @mnufc and Keystone Community Services to distribute food to those in need. The Free Farmers Market In a Box event is held outside of @allianzfield, where volunteers provide fresh goods, dairy and meat products for anyone needing food support.
\xe2\x80\xa2
\xe2\x80\x9cIn partnership with Minnesota United, we can support groups like Keystone and the Neighbors United Funding Collaborative that is working to reinforce a strong and sustainable Midway and Union Park \xe2\x80\x94 both during this time of need and in the future.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x94 Allianz Life President and CEO, Walter White. :grinning_face_with_big_eyes:
\xe2\x80\xa2
Every month, Keystone supports more than 6,000 people and provides food and emergency crisis assistance for families and individuals through a basic needs program. Allianz Life is matching all financial contributions up to $50,000 to support Keystone\xe2\x80\x99s initiatives in Saint Paul and the Midway Neighborhood. Also, Minnesota United and Allianz Life have donated $75,000 to help residents, local businesses, and organizations during the #COVID_19 pandemic. 
\xe2\x80\xa2
This response is one of the many ways Allianz is supporting around the world. Over the next weeks, we'll share more #AllianzForLife updates on how our global community is #strongertogether to make a difference."

b":movie_camera: In the face of #COVID_19, we stand united across the world to help our customers \xe2\x80\x94  no matter what! b"In Hungary, almost two million tons of high-quality food surplus is produced each year. @allianzhungaria provides \xe2\x82\xac30.000 to support the sustainable initiatives of the Hungarian Food Bank Association. The Association works tirelessly to locate and distribute food surplus to those who need it the most. 
\xe2\x80\xa2
Since the coronavirus outbreak, it has become increasingly challenging for the Association to carry out the food rescue work. The contribution from Allianz will cover the increased costs for transportation, logistics, and human resource and to expand the distribution network to reach more people. :clapping_hands::clapping_hands::clapping_hands:
\xe2\x80\xa2
As a socially responsible and environmentally conscious company, we support the mission to help people in need, minimize food waste, and lessen any harmful substances emitted during the food destruction process. :globe_showing_Americas::seedling:
\xe2\x80\xa2
This response is one of the many ways Allianz is supporting around the world. Over the next weeks, we'll share more #AllianzForLife updates on how our global community is #strongertogether to make a difference."

b":glowing_star: Tell us where do YOU find your #confidence during challenging times. @Allianz and @paralympics have joined forces and we want to uncover what confidence means.

During the Future Sessions you\xe2\x80\x99ll meet athletes, connect as a global community, and have a chance to win some great prizes*.

b"Allianz case managers from Allianz Private Krankenversicherungs AG ensure that all customers receive the best medical treatment and care they need in case of illness \xe2\x80\x94 whether they are admitted to the hospital, in need of follow-up rehab or care at home. Even during the coronavirus pandemic, our case managers are going above and beyond for our customers :grinning_face_with_big_eyes:
\xe2\x80\xa2
The APKV case managers recently helped a customer diagnosed with breast cancer to schedule the necessary operation five weeks earlier than initially proposed. In another example, they supported a customer suffering from chronic lung disease to be relocated to safe intensive home care in order to avoid possible COVID-19 infections at the local clinic. The case managers have also been here for our customers to find therapists offering physical or occupational rehab treatments online :person_getting_massage::laptop_computer::man_getting_massage_selector:
\xe2\x80\xa2
No matter which care is needed, our case managers are here to coordinate high-quality and tailored services to our customers:red_heart_selector:
\xe2\x80\xa2
This response is one of the many ways Allianz is supporting around the world. Over the next weeks, we'll share more #AllianzForLife updates on how our global community is #strongertogether to make a difference."

b"A mindful moment is a great way to start the day. Morning meditation can help you energize, to set an intention for the day, or even help you find peace before a busy day. :person_in_lotus_position::man_in_lotus_position_selector:
\xe2\x80\xa2
Since the coronavirus pandemic, a team of mindfulness ambassadors from @allianz_technology have been hosting a short meditation practice for colleagues to join virtually from around the world. Since we began the practice, our global mindfulness community has grown to over 5500 users. We are very grateful to the colleagues who share and lead
the daily practice of mindfulness. Thank you for helping us maintain a healthy brain and a positive outlook for what\xe2\x80\x99s ahead. :grinning_face_with_big_eyes:

This response is one of the many ways Allianz is supporting around the world. Over the next weeks, we'll share more #AllianzForLife updates on how our global community is #strongertogether to make a difference."

b"Health is top of mind during a pandemic. We have been offering Doc on Call services in 26 countries with partners such as Swiss firm Medi24. b"As parts of the world begin to recover from the impact of the coronavirus, we\xe2\x80\x99ve received many questions from brokers and customers regarding their investments in the rapidly changing markets :globe_showing_Americas:

b'#Allianz CEO @oliver_baete encourages everyone to use the app and do their part in helping to contain the spread of #covid19. Through the app, users will be notified if they have been exposed to a person diagnosed with #covid19, which helps in preventing potential infection chains. Those diagnosed with #covid19 can voluntarily and anonymously report their infection.

The app was developed by the German government in partnership with Deutsche Telekom and SAP, and ensures strict data privacy. If you\xe2\x80\x99re based in Germany, you can download the app and find out more info here: https://www.coronawarn.app/de/ 
#AllianzforLife #strongertogether #flattenthecurve'

b'Did you know voice robots are being used to diagnose and monitor the #COVID_19 status in France? :robot_face: The #AlloCovid Project is a free telephone service in France using artificial intelligence and speech analytics to relieve hotline congestion on the "15" (the French medical emergency number) and helping people take care.
\xe2\x80\xa2
@allianz_france has strengthened commitment to AI technology startup @allomedia and the AlloCovid project by financing the purchase of computer servers. The AlloCovid project has received support from Public Health France and many collaborators :red_heart_selector:. b"Starting a business is always risky. Small-to-medium enterprises (SMEs) do more than pay wages: they build communities and fire up the economy.
Due to the recent coronavirus-related disruptions, we could see one in 10 SMEs fold.
\xe2\x80\xa2
:headphone: Listen to the Monocle Magazine story on how Allianz is working to help the hard-up around the world.
From @allianz_france contributing \xe2\x82\xac150m to a \xe2\x82\xac1.5bn fund that helps ventures. To accelerating the \xe2\x82\xac30bn trade-credit insurance in Germany to help the Mittelstand. SMEs are the fuel for many economies.

This response is one of the many ways Allianz is supporting around the world. Over the next weeks, we'll share more #AllianzForLife updates on how our global community is #strongertogether to make a difference."

b"A lot has changed in the last months. All of us had to adapt our lives and follow guidelines to get over the #COVID_19 crisis. Rules are changing daily. You might be wondering if the internet connection is safe for working at home? How to manage rent payments, whether as a landlord or tenant? Or even my rights when visiting the supermarket?
\xe2\x80\xa2
Cristina Vassiliadu is one of the legal experts at Allianz Italy who is helping customers with their big questions. We\xe2\x80\x99ve set up a legal hotline :telephone_selector: to advise on corona-related concerns around affairs, property, rights, rules, etc. Due to the high demand, we\xe2\x80\x99ve extended the legal hotline service to serve customers in Germany, the UK, Hungary, Laos, Poland, Argentina, Mexico, France, and Switzerland :raising_hands::raising_hands::raising_hands:
If we can help you with legal advice, contact your local Allianz branch. We\xe2\x80\x99ll continue to offer this service as the :globe_showing_Americas: world slowly opens up again.
\xe2\x80\xa2
This response is one of the many ways Allianz is supporting around the world. Over the next weeks, we'll share more #AllianzForLife updates on how our global community is #strongertogether to make a difference."

b'Our sister company @eulerhermes joins the effort to search for a #COVID_19 vaccine by allocating funds to @who recognized Italian biotech company, @takis_biotech, who has been actively developing a vaccine from the very beginning.

Following early encouraging results, the research is entering the most crucial phase of trials on humans. "The support from Euler Hermes Italia will enable us to achieve the important goal to find a vaccine against COVID-19" - CEO of Takis.

b"Coronavirus isn\xe2\x80\x99t the only illness that we need to watch. :headphone: Listen to the Monocle Magazine story on why we have teamed up with Berlin-based mental-health training platform @hellobetterde to offer meaningful support to anyone who requires it.

b"\xe2\x80\x9cWe take care for each other\xe2\x80\x9d is a motto we are proud to live by every day. All Allianz employees working in Germany received a special package in the last weeks that included three face masks, care instructions, and a letter of appreciation. :red_heart_selector:
We will always be there for the health and well-being of our people and society.
\xe2\x80\xa2
As you can imagine, hand-packing and delivering over 34,000 packages (total of 102K masks) in two weeks was a huge effort :flexed_biceps: \xe2\x80\x94 only made possible by the tireless dedication from 100 employees working at @allianz_deutschland \xe2\x80\x9cDruckzentrum\xe2\x80\x9d (Print and Output Center) who were ready to go the extra mile. b"For the communities in :Greece: Greece who are most affected by #COVID_19 \xe2\x80\x94 we want to share some hope! At Allianz Greece, our team is proud to work with @wisegreece, a Greek social start-up, to support the Hope Box initiative in distributing food and basic necessities to  those who need it most right now. Each Hope Box is a care package filled with legumes, honey, pasta, jams, and other essentials.
\xe2\x80\xa2
Wise Greece offers over 1,000 Greek food products with a social cause. A portion of each purchase is allocated to ensure
healthy meals are available to local underserved communities. Wise Greece was the winner of the Allianz Future Generations Award in 2019 for its work in tackling youth employment and hunger.
:clapping_hands::clapping_hands::clapping_hands:
\xe2\x80\xa2
This response is one of the many ways Allianz is supporting around the world. Over the next weeks, we'll share more

b"\xe2\x80\x9cWe know most of the family providers in the Santa Rita (S\xc3\xa3o Paulo) community are self-employed, micro-entrepreneurs, or people working in local shops. We cannot stop showing solidarity and assisting families who are most at risk.\xe2\x80\x9d
\xc2\xb7 
Many communities and residents in S\xc3\xa3o Paulo are facing uncertainty to meet basic needs since the #COVID_19 lockdown began in Brazil. Over the last weeks, the incredible @allianzbrasil team has delivered over 20 tons of food, personal hygiene, and cleaning items to almost 1,000 families of the community. Behind the protective gear and appropriate distance, each package is dropped-off with a smile by a volunteer. :clapping_hands::clapping_hands::clapping_hands:
\xc2\xb7 
This response is one of the many ways Allianz is supporting around the world. Over the next weeks, we'll share more #AllianzForLife updates on how our global community is #strongertogether to make a difference."

b"For over a month, France :France: is united to support healthcare professionals dealing with #COVID_19. @allianz_france has contributed tremendously \xe2\x80\x94 a few weeks ago, the team donated \xe2\x82\xac1.5M to provide French hospitals with 122 ultra-portable ultrasound scanners :thumbs_up:
\xe2\x80\xa2
Time is key! The ultrasound scanners allow doctors to immediately assess the situation of patients with COVID-19 symptoms and choose without delay the best referral for them. \xe2\x80\xa2 \xe2\x80\x9cWe have been waiting for these ultrasound scanners for over two years but couldn\xe2\x80\x99t get the budget. This response is one of the many ways Allianz is supporting around the world. Over the next weeks, we'll share more #AllianzForLife updates on how our global community is #strongertogether to make a difference."

b"Curious to find out how our employees all over the world continue to build community remotely? :globe_showing_Americas: :raising_hands:

b"Entrepreneurs, makers, technologists, and designers are part of a global movement working on innovations to fight against #COVID_19. One promising solution is @oxygen_project_ ,a device which addresses the global shortage of ventilators in hospitals. The Barcelona-based team @protofy.xyz has designed a low-cost ventilator and has made the designs free to download for anyone who wants to build them.
:clapping_hands::clapping_hands::clapping_hands::clapping_hands::clapping_hands:
@allianz_es (Allianz Spain) is the main sponsor of the OxyGEN project so that more ventilators can be available where needed. We will continue to support entrepreneurs and innovations which improve the lives of many people during this pandemic. 
If you are interested to learn, support or download the open-source designs, go to: oxygen.protofy.xyz
This response is one of the many ways Allianz is supporting around the world. Over the next weeks, we'll share more #AllianzForLife updates on how our global community is #strongertogether to make a difference."

b'#COVID_19 affects all of us, no matter how old we are. As schools around the world are temporarily closed, around 1.6 billion children have to find new ways of learning from their homes. Never has there been such a significant disruption to education. 
Remote schooling can be a great challenge for children and their families, especially in vulnerable populations. Not only because children often have special educational needs. Equipment is also a huge problem. There are situations in which children don\xe2\x80\x99t have access to a computer, or they would need to share with five other siblings. Making school work very difficult. 
To support, Allianz Poland has provided computers to @sos_childrens_villages so that children can take part in school activities. We\xe2\x80\x99re also fundraising with our employees, agents, and clients to provide SOS Children\xe2\x80\x99s Villages additional resources to tackle the most urgent needs related to remote learning. 
This response is one of the many ways Allianz is supporting around the world. Over the next weeks, we\xe2\x80\x99ll share more #AllianzForLife updates on how our global community is #strongertogether to make a difference.'

b'While most of us continue to stay home to slow the spread of #covid_19, not all of us can. Healthcare workers are risking their lives on the frontlines while having to face another hidden challenge - not being able to go home to their families. Taking measures to prevent exposure of the virus, some are sleeping at the hospital, or not sleeping at all. \nWe wanted to find more ways to help healthcare workers and make their lives just a little bit easier. Allianz in Turkey (@allianzturkiye ), Lokman Hekim Health Foundation, and Istanbul Public Health Authority joined together to launch "Be the Air" - a solidarity action to provide free housing (at least two months) for frontline workers in Istanbul. It also calls for the community to show support to our brave healthcare workers every night at 9PM with rounds of applause. Join us! :clapping_hands::clapping_hands::clapping_hands: This response is one of the many ways Allianz is supporting around the world. Over the next weeks, we\'ll share more #AllianzForLife updates on how our global community is #strongertogether to make a difference.'

b'We are stronger together! Last week, #AllianzAyudhya (@azayfan) in Thailand joined efforts with #AllianzChinaLife to launch the \xe2\x80\x9cSend Shield to Doctor\xe2\x80\x9d initiative to provide protective equipment to healthcare workers. \nWithin 24 hours, over 700 community members - customers, agents, employees, partners - pulled together 1.4 million Baht (approximately 40k EUR). And the good news - 4,000 N95 masks and 1,000 PPE suits will be sent to healthcare workers in Thailand by the end of the month. A big thank you to everyone. \nThis response is one of the many ways Allianz is supporting around the world. Over the next weeks, we\xe2\x80\x99ll share more #AllianzForLife updates on how our global community is #strongertogether to make a difference.'

b'Healthcare professionals around the world are saving lives and containing the #covi\xcc\x87d19 spread. Often, they need to keep a safe distance from loved ones. That\xe2\x80\x99s why @Allianz_France has partnered with @studapart to offer free accommodation to frontline workers across the country. Currently, our team is matching healthcare workers to the 1,500 available spaces - and looking to meet the increasing demands. 
If you are interested in volunteering your space or if you are a healthcare worker in France looking for accommodation, please comment, share, or DM us.

This response is one of the many ways Allianz is supporting around the world. Over the next weeks, we\xe2\x80\x99ll share more #AllianzForLife updates on how our global community is #strongertogether to make a difference.'

b'#StayatHome is important during #Covid_19, but also a challenge for everyone. Jointly with the German startup @hellobetterde (Hello Better), Allianz offers a free mental health program that provides expert support via phone, online-trainings and an online community with live Q&A sessions.

With additional demand, this program can scale up to other countries and languages to provide help for those that need it in these challenging times. #StayTuned

Please comment or DM if you are interested in this service. 
#AllianzForLife #StrongerTogether #stayathome #starkdurchdiekrise'

b'To help with the current #Covid_19 situation and alongside with the Sapio Group, we are providing oxygen systems for a brand new intensive care hospital in Milan. \nAn incredibly hard working team completed this new facility in just ten days. Inspiring to see what can be achieved by everyone working together when it really matters. \n#AllianzForLife #StrongerTogether #stayathome #flattenthecurve'

b'In response to the current health situation Allianz ambassador and international pianist, Lang Lang wanted to share a virtual gift. \nAllianz wishes everyone good health, if you wish to see updates on how Allianz is managing this impact, click here https://bit.ly/3drZiqa #flattenthecurve #togetherwearestronger #langlang'

b'Who\xe2\x80\x99s your female role model? :woman_scientist::woman_pilot_selector::woman_firefighter::woman_office_worker: On International Women\xe2\x80\x99s Day, join us as we honor the extraordinary and influential women in our lives!

Let\xe2\x80\x99s actively recognize the achievements of women around us, including the trailblazers who made an impact in the field of science and technology.

Tag or comment your personal female heroes below, and let\xe2\x80\x99s shine some light on the women who make us and the world a better place every day!

#iwd2020 #internationalwomensday'

b'Purpose! - what we all need in life!
